remarks: The isomorphism H for a lattice ` K ` is a one-to-one function.  Part of proof after Lemma N of [Crawley] p. 122 line 6.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dihf11.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihf11.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihf11.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihf11.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihf11.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
dihf11 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> I : B -1-1-> S ) $.
